column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////The ambience was nice for casual self service brunch and coffee .  The food was good
column2: the cake and bakery section was great.  I Have the strawberry shortcakes at the restaurant
column3: it was great.  And I ordered to go for my friends : chocolate chip
column5: and  a Boston cream kind of like upside down muffin ( forgot the name).  They said those bakeries were great also.
